text: Spoon is a noontime cooking talk show featuring celebrities from other networks. The show has premiered on March 25, 2007, and hosted by Janice de Belen until it ended for eight years in 2015 on Net 25. It was relaunched with the slogan "I Am One With 25". ==See also== *List of programs previously broadcast by Net 25 Category:Philippine television talk shows Category:2007 Philippine television series debuts Category:2015 Philippine television series endings Category:Net 25 original programming Category:Filipino-language television shows
title: Spoon (TV program)
